document_data.name: Togar Ironseth
document_data.mainbody: '''Togar Ironseth''' was a [[human]] blacksmith in [[Amnwater]], [[Amn]], around [[1368 DR]], and a member of the [[Ironseth]] family, owners of about half of the land around Amnwater.
document_data.Description: The large dark skinned smith learned his trade from a [[dwarven]] blacksmith.
document_data.Relationships: Togar's father was [[Ghaark Ironseth|Lord Ghaark Ironseth]]. Togar was best friends with [[Jhanos Yhliivast|Lord Jhanos Yhliivast]].
